full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/17/2023 PAKISTAN 5 RS. AFFIDAVIT I, Mrs. MAKBER JAN wife of Mr. Muzaffar Khan Raja, resident of village Perchhan, Post Office Kotli Sattiyan, Tehsil Murree, District Rawalpindi, do hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under:- a) That I belong to a remote village, where my birth took place. No Town/ Municipal Committee or Union Council existed there at that time. b) I was born at village Khalabutt, P.O. Ban, District Rawalpindi in 1917. This fact was known to me just after passing a few years from my parents. c) The same year of birth has therefore been entered in my National Identity Card so as to make it proof of my birth for all purposes wherever I am required to submit this information. d) Since my birth I have shown the same year of birth and no change has been made. This is my real year of birth and I stand responsible for it at present and in future wherever I am asked about the year of my birth. Exact date is however not known to me due to passage of a long time of as many as 76 years, The above-mentioned statement given by me is true to the best of my knowledge and belief and nothing has been concealed therefrom. DEPONENT: PAKISTAN UL ATTESTED MRS. MAKBER JAN WIFE OF SL MR. MUZAFFAR KHAN RAJA J.C. NO. 215-17-136850 Dated: 16 May 93 SUSHARRAP PUBLIC RS10 ATTESTATION STAMP 1 7 MAY 1993
